state.text: Even if you had good intentions, I'm not going to respect you calling yourself after the captain, because you aren't him.

Any chance I could persuade you to give up, while you still can?

state.text: Don't know if I can win with ~self.hand~. Looks like it might be my turn again -- took long enough, didn't it?

case.state: I'd rather do someone else's chores... And that's not exactly something I do enthusiastically.

state.text: Oh, I'm not really big on romance and... dating. Pass?

case.state: To be honest, I'm not one who's big on flirting. You two probably know as much as I do about that.

I've never seen other people walk in here while a game's going on. That probably won't change to~background.time~.

It's a little hard to say but... I'd probably tell my younger self to enjoy the time spent with my friends, family, and mentor more. You never really appreciate something until it's gone.
Good question, Lucina. I'd probably tell myself to spend more time at the beach. I didn't know what I was missing out on until recently!
Well, I've already got some of my friends here, like ~fe3h~... I suppose I could try inviting other people, though...
Well, I guess I could stand to invite some of pals... Hmm. I wonder what it'd take to convince Ignatz to come here...
You know, I guess this could be pretty fun with some familiar company. I wonder how things would go down if I asked Hilda to come here...

If you don't mind, ~raynor~, I'd rather leave talk about war at the door. I came here to get away from all of that.
Well, my company is mostly made up of my classmates from Golden Deer house. We've known each other for years now, so we trust each other.
I have weapon studies tomorrow. My professor has me focusing on my bow and riding skills, but I'm still learning all about lances on the side.
Well, I have a class in weapon studies tomorrow. My professor has me focusing on bows and riding at the moment, but I'm still keeping up with lances on the side.
`Invisible` dye? Or, rather, dye that makes things invisible? That can't be a thing, can it? You'd think assassins would use it all the time, if it were real...

Well, I'm not really a mage myself, but I know it's useful for more than just fighting. You can use magic to help grow crops, track animals... I think some nobles even use it to spice up their cooking...

Well, nobody really teases me in the way I think you mean, Syrenne. If a guy was trying that with me, I imagine he's just being a bit of an ass.

Opening lines, huh? How about... "Hey, wanna go train together?"... Wait, no, one more. "Hey dude, wanna go train together, shirtless?" ... Yeah, I'm not great at openers.

When I go into the village to buy something, I usually get all my chores done in one go. It saves me from having to make a round trip!

Shamir, are you still going to be running that bow seminar later? I'm ready for another lesson.
Shamir, are you still running the seminar on bows and lances later? I think it's about time I had another lesson.

I heard Mia's from a family of spirit mediums, so you should have no trouble talking to ~ghost_tgt~, right?

condition.saying: Oh? Would you prefer I was drooling over you instead, Leonie? Don't worry, I have plenty of attention to go around.

case.state: That's not... You know that's not what I meant, Hilda.

I'm sure it's not hard for you to guess what mine are, Ignatz!
Are you a total beginner, Fina? In that case, just try to keep cards with matching numbers. Oh, if you get five cards with the same symbol on them, keep them instead.
Never been hit bad enough to get a scarred wound. Even if I did, healing magic does wonders.
I've never been hit bad enough to get a scar. I guess I'm just too good!

state.text: You know, that actually sounds... interesting, Aella. Not that I'd actually do it!
You aren't the only one that's thought about that, Aella. I-I mean, I would probably never do it.

case.state: I've always been partial to a good Vegetable Stir-Fry. Just, not when Flayn is the one cooking - that girl nearly set the kitchen on fire using veggies.
I love a good King of Beasts Steak. You need to kill a Duscur bear to get it, which is a big task, but the end result is delicious!

condition.saying: The Joestar spirit will get me through this!

case.state: What is that, a star tattoo? I guess it suits you!
Is that a star tattoo? Wait, no, is that a birthmark? I didn't know you could get birthmarks like that.
Oh, she doesn't look too happy about that one, Wheatley...
This is the set up for some kind of joke, right? We've got to go catch it, or something?
I heard that one's a toughie. You'll do fine though, I've seen your training. Just don't trip up on the written portion.
You'll do fine, don't worry. Just remember that you're trying to write to meet specific keywords in the written portion.
Your landscapes are always amazing. I'd love to see you do a portrait -- just make sure you get my good side.
Fódlan's a pretty nice place. Thanks to my training at Garreg Mach, I get to see more of the continent than most do in a lifetime!
Fódlan's a nice place, but I've never been outside it. Except for this one mission in Brigid, actually.
So you're the infamous Twisted Fate. I heard about you before the game, you know. Don't try any funny tricks now.
Oh, I'm not really big on romance and... dating. Pass?
People always talk about romance, but, honestly, I'm not interested in that kind of stuff.
Easy answer for me -- orange! I'm sure you could already tell.
That's an easy answer for me -- orange! But I've always wondered, which came first: the fruit, or the color?
I think that's a bit disrespectful, claiming to be a goddess...
A goddess? You? Yeah right.
Hey, no need to run your mouth and pretend to be a goddess. That's disrespectful.
I don't get a lot of time to play sports, but I'm a pretty good runner. Although, I guess you could count sparring as a sport.
Oh, I... I hardly ever spend time naked. I like having the feeling of wearing something, even if it's just my underwear.
My trip was pretty simple... once I figured out where I was going. There was this thing called an Out-realm Gate, and it just... let me come here.
Maybe the different outrealms have more in common than they first appear?
I'm not sure, Fina. Maybe our worlds have more in common than you would think at first glance?
I'm pretty good with a bow. Lances, too.
A completely different life? Well if that were the case, you'd be someone else entirely.
If you grew up in a completely different way, you'd be a different person entirely. Why do you ask?
If a version of me grew up without the Captain, I don't think I'd be the woman I am today. It wouldn't be me.
I mean, never intentionally, no. Sometimes things happen when you're coming out of the bath, or the sauna.
I think `beast of burden' is the right term. It's this animal that... uh... has four legs. And it's got a beefy body. We use them to pull carts... or ride on them into battle.
You can only cast explosion? But surely if you're versed in Reason you can at least cast Fire as well?
You can only cast an explosion spell? Surely you can cast something else, like Fire, at the very least?

state.text: You know, ~jim~, just because I like you doesn't mean I'm going to go easy on you!

case.state: So you're an actual ghost, Polly? A ghost that parties? ... What's that like?
So, Polly, you... you're a ghost? A party ghost? This is just some kind of magic trick, isn't it?
So you're an actual ghost, Spooky? A ghost that runs a haunted mansion? ... You're just pulling my leg, aren't you?
So you're an actual ghost, ~ghost_tgt~? What's... what's that like?
The Pink Dragon sounds like something incredibly inappropriate.
You don't exactly strike me as the saintly type. Have you ever gone to choir practice? Try something else.
Well you do lead on a bunch of the knights at the monastery. Maybe Heartstringer would suit you, then.
If you really want to stay true to yourself, you might end up with a title like "Idle Maiden."
(Sounds like Bernadetta.) I would check on them now and again, but leave them be for the most part.
Wait, we're not allowed to bet actual money here, are we? ... are we?
Hold on, I thought one of the rules was we couldn't bet actual money? ... if we could, I'd take that bet.
Fear the Deer! Wait, that's pretty catchy...
My desire? To be the greatest mercenary Fódlan has ever known.
My desire? To be the greatest mercenary in Fódlan, of course. Just like Captain Jeralt.
I'd hope not. Otherwise we'll all be in pretty big trouble in the afterlife, won't we?
A giant frog? How big are we talking? Ten feet tall?
I've fought some giant beasts in my time, but I don't think I've ever heard of a giant frog...
I've fought some giant animals in my time, but I don't think I've ever seen a giant frog...
Me and my friends have to fight demonic beasts on a regular basis. We've gotten pretty good at coordinating our attacks to break through its armor.
My class and I have to fight giant beasts - bigger than a house! I'll have to keep score of how many giant birds we fight, since we always seem to run into them...
"France"? I've never even heard of a place called France.
"France" doesn't happen to be anywhere near Fódlan, does it?
I enjoy spending time in nature - but, probably for different reasons than you do...
Right... Okay. So, my question is: What are duel monsters?
A net? For cabbage? What are you talking about, Megumin?
A net for cabbage? Is that some local slang from your village, Megumin?
I... wow, I don't even know how to respond to that, Miss Pauling.
Well... that's certainly a gruesome story. I've never dealt with anything quite like that.
Unless you mean that time Claude made Lysithea wield a hammer as a practical joke, I don't know what you mean.
Can't say I have, Lux. Why, are they looking for someone in particular?
Oh yeah, it's my birthday today. It wouldn't surprise me if my professor brings me something later - they've been doing that for all the students.
Oh right, it's my birthday today. I haven't really planned anything special for it... I'll probably just do my usual routine later.
Say Amy, where are you keeping that hammer of yours? It just sort of... disappears sometimes?
Hey Amy, where do you hide that hammer of yours? It just kind of... vanishes when I'm not looking?
I hope I don't lose, because I'm not used to doing that sort of thing in front of others, either...

state.text: Oh, I'm not really into the whole 'romance' thing. I know other girls my age are, but not me.
To be honest, Ayano, I’m not one who’s big on dating. You probably know more about that than I do, really.

case.state: I'm guessing it's not the same Professor I know, is it?
Is ~Bernadetta~ alright? She's just... standing there. Did she faint standing up?
~Bernadetta~, you there? You're just standing there... wait, did you faint standing up?
I don't think any of us are from around here...
I don't think we're allowed to grab our stuff after we've taken it off...
I'd be down for a snack. Any chance we can waive the rules this one time?
Today's the day the Leicester Alliance was founded, I think. Not that it means much to the rest of you.
I believe today's the day we celebrate the Leicester Alliance being founded. In a roundabout way, that's the reason I'm in Golden Deer, huh?
There was one battle I was in where, no matter how hard I tried, I couldn't hit anything... Claude didn't let me live that one down for a week.
There was one occasion where my shirt got torn during training... nearly flashed the whole class, but I don't think anybody saw.
Professor Seteth helped me catch this absolute beauty of a fish — it had rainbow scales, and its fins were like... I guess that's not really what you meant, is it?
If I took up flight training, I could get certified to fly a pegasus. Not too sure about ice magic, though. That's not really my area.
Oh yeah, happy birthday, Hilda! Did you get a gift this year?
This "Wikipedia" guild you work for can't pay for its own things? Or is it more of a charity?
Please, spare us.
I'll tell you now -- if these are just a bunch of lame skeleton puns, I will get mad.
Oh yeah, happy birthday, Ignatz! Did you get a gift this year?
The Hotrealm? Oh yeah, I remember seeing you there! Maybe we'll cross paths at the beach some other day, too.
The Hotrealm? Oh yeah, I remember seeing you there! Funny that the second time we've met, we're back at the beach.
I've come to blows with a few people, yes. Nobody who didn't deserve it, though. Just bandits, thieves, heretics... that sort of thing. Never met any ghosts before now, though.
He's not--! I mean, Jeralt isn't my crush. He's my mentor. He taught me all the basics about fighting, wilderness survival... I want to be like him, not... anything else.
I have been known to throw back a few beers, yeah. Nothing too strong, though. I'll still need to walk back home aftewards.
We have herbs that help ease pain or help stop blood from-- Wait, you just trying to find something to get pissed with, aren't you?
I mean the greenhouse has a lot of herbs in it, a few of them are used to make medic-- Wait, you're just looking to get wasted with some of them, aren't you?
You know, ~bernie_tgt~, we're in the same school but we don't hang out that much. How are you?
Say, ~bernie_tgt~? We should hang out more. How have you been?
So ~human~, you... have white hair? Is there any particular story behind that?
Hey ~human~, your hair is a pretty interesting color. Have you always had white hair?
Don't things seem a little bit unbalanced tonight? Us girls vs ~only_male~, the only boy here.
Hey, don't things seem a little off here? ~Only_male~ is the only guy at our table.
So ~human~, who did you come here to meet? Girls? Or guys? You did say you were into both, right?
So ~human~, who did you come here to look at? Girls? Or guys? You did say you were into both, right?
So what is this, a girl's night out?
Is this the sort of thing you girls usually get up to?
So, this is a women's night out, right? Not really a typical girly activity.
Oh, right! Happy birthday, ~Bernadetta~! Hope you got something you wanted this year.
Hey ~fighter_target~, I know you're good at sewing, but how would you handle... fighting in close quarters?
Hey ~fighter_target~, I know you're good with a bow, but how would you handle a melee scrap?
(While I'm here, maybe I should ask ~fighter_target~ for combat advice?)
(Come to think of it, maybe I should ask ~fighter_target~ for some combat tips while I have the chance.)
Hey ~fighter_target~, you look like you're good in a fight. Any tips for fighting up close?
Hey ~fighter_target~, you get into fights, right? Got any tips for close range?
Hey ~fighter_target~, you look like you're good in a fight. Any tips for fighting up close?
Hey ~fighter_target~, you get into fights, right? Got any tips for close range?
Paint a picture, ~rivalry_target~, it'll last longer.
What are you staring at, ~rivalry_target~?
What's wrong, ~rivalry_target~? Scared you might lose this round?
Don't underestimate me.
I'll turn the tables sooner or later.
I guess all of us had pretty similar ideas for how to unwind. I guess military life works up certain... frustrations, doesn't it?
I guess we all had the same idea for how to unwind. Military life works up certain... frustrations, doesn't it?
So this is how it is, huh? You guys are hardly intimidating. I don't think I have anything to worry about.
This night is going to go by pretty quickly at this rate. You guys are hardly throwing me off.
So you're an artist, right ~artist~? I used to have an affinity for painting when I was a kid, but more... practical skills called to me.
You're an artist, right ~artist~? I had a bit of a thing for painting when I was a kid, but then I felt the call of more... practical skills.
Back home, I always trained alone. No one else in my village wanted to be a mercenary.
This isn't a very 'girly' activity, is it? Well, it's too late to worry about that anyway.
I wonder how much traffic this place gets? I heard it was a good way to meet all sorts of travellers. I guess that turned out to be true!
(Crap, I forgot about my daily chores. I'd better sort that out quick when I get back.)
Anyone suddenly feeling a little self-conscious, or am I just getting the jitters?
I can fight under any conditions. Well, this isn't really fighting, but it is a competition!
Anyone ever tried bear meat? I've heard it's quite chewy, but rich in protein.
I don’t care what you all think of me. I just don’t want to lose to you.
Don't forget to do some stretches! Don't let your muscles settle down when you have to stand still.
Never been one to back down. Wonder what Jeralt would have done in a game like this?
(Haven't sent a letter to mom since the war started. I should probably change that when I get back.)
I wonder if they do any other game nights here? Maybe real poker? I'd be down for that. 20,000 gold buy-in, anyone?
Never been one to back down. Wonder what Jeralt would do in a game like this? He must've done this sort of thing at taverns at least once...
(I wonder how Mom's doing back home? I hope the letter I sent reaches her.)
I wonder if they do any other game nights here? Dice games, maybe?
The scenery is nice... as long as you don't think about the creepy crawlies hiding under the rocks. Ugh.
Sure is hot out. Who wants to go swimming later?
Even like this, I'm top tier. No, really!
Actually, I barely knew anything about Brigid before getting to the academy. Petra and I met there when we first joined, right?
Wyverns? I dunno... Something about being up in the air gives me the jitters. It'd be dead handy for tactical advantage, though...
Petra? You... do know what you're saying, right? Calling me... attractive? I think you're mistaken.
Uh... Petra? Not that I don't appreciate being called attractive, but... I think you're using the wrong word by mistake.
Oh... Heh. There's forward, and then there's forward, Petra. Don't count me out of the running just yet!
Well thanks ~Bernadetta~, that's a real confidence booster.
Can't say that I'm crushing on anybody. I don't really think about romance... at all. Plus, nobody's interested in me in turn.
I'm not really into that sort of thing. Nobody at the academy is really interested in me, either.
Can't say that I crushed on anybody. I didn't really think about romance... at all. Plus, nobody was interested in me in turn.
I'm not really into that sort of thing. Nobody at the academy was really interested in me, either. I have other things to focus on.
It's only a small setback, Hilda. I... I didn't want to make it too hard for your first round.
I was just showing you the ropes, Hilda. I thought I'd go easy on you as you... 'adjusted'.
"Share the same purpose"? So you were raised to be a weapon? That's a bit grim.
I was wondering something, ~Laevatein~. You said you share your name with your sword...
Oh? Why thank you, Kumatora! I like your hair, too. I dunno what it is, but it's just so special!
You're really too kind, Kumatora. I think your hair's pretty cool, too. It's... well, it's special!
Hey, don't talk bad about Captain Jeralt! What do you have about men being in charge, anyway?
Yeah, yeah. Don't get too excited, Catboy. You never know what'll happen a minute from now.
I suppose it's not that different, Catboy. Though usually people aren't trying to ogle me in the changing room.
You think so, Hilda? Actually, I think I'd look good in a suit. Not a bad idea.
I guess it's a good thing that I was thinking the same thing, Hilda. I'd prefer to wear a suit rather than a frilly dress. They're not really my thing.
Yeah, I figured as much, Colt. So what're you trained in? I know you keep pointing those... `gun' things around.
Yeah, I figured as much, Colt. So what're you trained in? You strike me as... kind of a bow guy, y'know?
Well, yeah. I mean, even if I'm here to win, there's no point in being too sad about this, right?
Oh, Captain Jeralt's not my teacher, but I did apprentice under him before going to the academy.
Oh, the Captain's not my teacher, but I did apprentice under him before I went to the academy. I want to be a mercenary just like him one day.
Yep! Captain Jeralt took me in as his apprentice, and my village helped me get into the academy so that I could get the best training possible!
You already tried getting me to pick out a necklace -- and I declined, remember? I don't really need anything that isn't practical.
You think so, Hilda? Here, get a good look of it. May as well, right?
Hey, I think my boobs are great, too! Anyone would look bad when comparing to yours-- Er, you know what I mean.
Wait, that dancing getup? That's... I don't think it would suit me.
That whole dancing outfit? That... I don't think it would suit me, really.
My ass does get sore, Hilda. It's called `training your muscles'. That pain is just weakness leaving the body.
My legs and ass do get sore, Hilda. That's how you know that you're pushing yourself.
I guess I could- no, I'd rather lose than take off the necklace.
This necklace is too special to me. I'll just... take off my bra.
Captain Jeralt made this necklace for me a long time ago. It's a reminder of where I came from. So I'm keeping it on.
This necklace is a reminder of where I came from - Captain Jeralt made it. I'll keep it on.
Well Cynthia, the short version of the story is that Captain Jeralt helped out my village a long time ago, and ever since then, I wanted to be just like him -- a great mercenary!
Well Cynthia, the long and the short of it is, I'm training to be a mercenary, just like Captain Jeralt. I really admire him for all the good will he paid towards my village.
I grew up in a small town- a village, really. Years ago I would've said Captain Jeralt did most of my training, but that was years ago. The Officer's Academy helped refine me.
Well, the monastery itself is where the Church of Seiros is located. The Officer's Academy happens to be located on monastery grounds.
Well, I'm fighting for the Leicester Alliance. I was a member of the Golden Deer, after all -- no, I still am.
I'm training to fight for the Leicester Alliance, on paper at least. Really, I just want to become a great mercenary one day.
Well, I try to slip in some training wherever I can. I usually get in a few hours every day, but it varies.
Well, I try to get a few hours every day, but it can vary. I usually try to slip some training into my routine wherever I can.
Oh, wow, that's a hard question to answer. Most days I would say “No, I don't regret leaving home” in a heartbeat. Some days, however...
Lux, that's kind of put me on the spot. Most days I would say “No, I don't regret leaving home” in a heartbeat. Some days, however...
None other than Captain Jeralt, the greatest mercenary in Fódlan! The first time I saw him, he was kicking the ass of these mercenaries that were harassing my village.
Actually, I was about to mention that too, Petra. You always seem to be busy when I try to make time to speak with you.
Oh yeah ? What part's giving you trouble? I always saw you as more of a sword girl... the difference between a short blade and a polearm can be quite hard to overcome.
Yeah, magic doesn't really suit me. I'm quite good at using a few weapons: bows, lances, swords... even axes!
Wandering p--... Fina! I... I think you had the wrong idea about what I'm trying to do... I'm a fighter, not...
A wandering pros-- Fina! I... I think you had the wrong idea about what I'm trying to do... I'm a fighter not a...
Yeah, I prefer these short boots. I like having my feet closer to the ground... Makes it easier for me to brace myself to parry blows.

Oh, I know exactly what you're asking about, Zoe. Trust me, I've heard a few things here and there from other students. And to be honest? I dunno. Is it so wrong for me to look up to a man like the Captain?
I'm not really good at giving people nicknames on the spot. How about... the purple... strangler? No, no, that was awful. Sorry, I'm no good at this.
Byleth? I mean, if by "spark" you mean `I'm totally better than ~player.ifMale(him, and he|her, and she)~ knows it", then yeah. I could totally kick ~player.ifMale(his|her)~ butt any day of the week.
Wait, how'd you learn about that? I'm good at drawing maps, at least. Could never bring myself to draw something like a spider, though.
You can't go around punching every guy that doesn't show you respect. Usually, I just try to do a better job than them. One day, I'll take the captain's place and be the best damn mercenary alive!
A lot of things, Heris. I wouldn't say that I'm a traditional student like you're thinking of. I'm learning how to fight, and how to lead.
You could say that. I'm not really an athlete, but I'm pretty proud of my fitness. I've gotta get even stronger, though!
Oh, you know. Really tough guys who can hold their own -- but it's hard finding tough guys that aren't also massive dickheads. You know how it is.

Yeah, it's tough to get in. I think I got lucky, knowing Captain Jeralt to act as a character reference. Even so, my whole village had to pitch in so that I could afford the entrance fee. I've gotta pay them back.
I guess you could say that. I'm just a girl trying to make her way in the world as a fighter.
Oh, don't worry about me, Catboy. I'm hardly fragile.
Wait, I thought we were messing with each other. I'm hardly fragile, Catboy.
I grew up in a small town- a village, really. Most of my proper training comes from Captain Jeralt, but the Officer's Academy is helping to refine my skills.
Yeah! The way I see it, there's no point in getting all wound up about it... After all, we all came here to play strip poker, right?
Dastards... Fine, I'll do it.
Very funny. You'll be sorry in a minute.
You just wanted to see a fit girl in the buff, didn't you, ~human~?
Yeah, yeah, laugh it up now.
I really lost that one? Are you kidding me?
Oh, really? That's just my luck, isn't it?
Let's not mention this back at the Officer's Academy, alright?
We aren't going to talk about this back at school, are we?
Let's not mention this back at Garreg Mach, alright?
We aren't going to talk about this back home, are we?
Wow, am I really out first? Guess I'd better get things started.
Wow, I'm really out first? Guess I'd better hurry up and get rid of this jacket then!
My turn again? Already? I just went and... Oh, fine.
Is it really my turn again? I just went!
Laugh it up while you can, guys. This is only a small bump in the road for me.
I didn't expect to come out without a scratch!
This'll even things out, then. I'm not opposed to leveling the playing field.
I didn't come here to lose, but looks like winning won't be a breeze either.
Oh, my turn? No problem!
It's like I always say... Wait, what do I always say?
This'll make things a bit more even, right? Heh.
Hells—looks like it's my turn again.
After this I won't be taking any more off, I swear.
I'll get through this - I'm quite stubborn.
Dang, Almost got away with it. Oh well, at least I'm still ahead.
Damn, I thought I could get away without taking off my shirt. Oh well!
Well, I almost got away with it. You all know what comes next...
Darn it. Well, I'm still ahead, so this should be fine. Right?
Ah, good. I can finally take my boots off, and I'm still ahead of the curve!
I'm still ahead of the curve, right? I'll have no problems taking off my boots, then.
Darn it. It's not going to be easy getting ahead...
Dang. It's not going to be easy for me to pull ahead...
If it had to be someone, looks like I drew the short straw.
Don't get comfortable! I didn't come here to lose!

state.text: It's only a small setback. I'll do better next round.

case.state: My turn again? Damn.
Hells. Starting to slip, aren't I?
Hells—my turn again? Really?
Okay, is one of you rigging things against me?
Oh for- no, it's fine, I'll do it.
Oh, come on! Me, again? Really?
Can't I catch a freaking break tonight?
Are you kidding me? For f... forget it.
It just had to be me, didn't it?
Beginner's lack-of-luck, I guess.
Don't get cocky, I'll come back from this.
Really? My turn again?
I must've put my lucky necklace on wrong, because this isn't right.
Am I still in last place? Damn... Gotta step up my game here.
Of all the people here, it had to be me again?
This just isn't my night.
You've got to be kidding.
Oh, I guess not. Still, I... wasn't really expecting you to be so forward, Petra.
There's nothing wrong with it. I just wasn't expecting you to be so... forward about it, Petra.
Being competitive is just how I am... And I just can't help but compete when a girl like you is around, Petra.
Being competitive is just how I am... And I just can't help but compete when a girl like you is around, Petra. And these guys, too...
The monastery is a neutral territory between the three major nations of Fódlan, so it was the perfect place for us to learn the art of war.
The monastery is a neutral place in the heart of Fódlan, which made it ideal for students from all nations to learn the art of war.

state.text: I know you insisted that I decorate my bow, Hilda, but at least it still shoots fine. Didn't think to bring it with me today, though.

case.state: You do need a certain physique to use heavy weapons like that. You're a mage, right? They're not usually so big on using anything heavier than a dagger, from what I've seen.
I get what you mean, Catboy. Everyone that comes here seems friendly... For the most part, at least.
I get what you mean, don't worry. Most people who come to this place seem friendly enough.
Embarrassed? ... No, look all you like, Catboy.
It's doing great. Thanks for your help, by the way.
Wait, your entire world didn't have any men? That's ridiculous!
Just giving you a bit of breathing room, ~bernadetta~. It'd be mean to force you to go first, after all!
The captain taught me the basics, and now I'm pushing myself to get even better!
He's not my only mentor at the Officer's Academy, so I'm getting a good chance to study a bunch of different fighting styles.
You don't have to remind me, Angela. I gained a few bruises here and there while I was first learning how to shoot.
No need to remind me, Angela. I got a few bad bruises here and there when I was first learning how to shoot.
Hey, is there something wrong about my confidence? I know what I'm capable of, and I know that I need to keep pushing myself.
It's a collection of noble families, all working together under one banner. I'm not here to give you a history lecture, though.
The alliance is... well, an alliance of noble houses, all working under on banner. I think the term is 'confederacy'?
When I say I want to be a mercenary, I don't mean I want to become some hapless brigand. More of... a wandering knight-for hire.
When I say I want to become a mercenary, I don't mean some disloyal sellsword. More of... a wandering knight-for-hire.
I was thinking more of a wandering knight-for-hire. Like my mentor, Jeralt! He looked out for my village when it needed a knight, and I want to pay that kind of good will forward.

condition.saying: notice how guys line up to spar with you

case.state: What? Don't be silly. Guys just ask me to spar because they know I can put up a good fight. Besides, they hardly find me attractive when I'm done kicking their asses, right?
You're right. A suit would do me well... We could definitely get me one. Though, would people see me as even less of a girl then?
Petra? ... Petra? You okay? Use your words.
The monastery is a neutral territory between the three major nations of Fódlan, so it's the perfect place for us to learn the art of war.
The monastery is a neutral place in the heart of Fódlan, which makes it ideal for students from all nations to learn the art of war.
I'd be ready to throw down any time, Saki. Just try me, I dare you.
Trust me, Saki, it wouldn't be much of a fight. I'd knock you over in a heartbeat.
Hey, let's not get ourselves worked into a ball of sadness. We have to take each day as they come. It makes sense to be homesick.
Hey, don't get so caught up about it. We have to take each day as it comes. Everyone feels homesick, don't they? Don't feel bad about it.
"Share the same purpose"? So you were raised to be a weapon? That's a bit grim.
You're gonna make me blush, Hilda. You're just showering me with comments tonight... You're not just doing that to throw me off guard, right?
You're going to make me blush if you keep showering me with compliments. Wait, you're not just doing that to throw me off, are you?
What? Don't be silly. Nobody's chasing after me unless they need something done.
Well, one trick is that you're trying to use the tip of your lance to aim. You can't just swing it wide like a sword. You have to go for precision blows.

state.text:
Well, I do like to get blood pumping in other ways. Going for a light jog usually...
Wait, you meant...
